dict.acceptation: 行为；行动；法案，法令；短节目；

sent.orig: Details about ACT can be at act. org.
sent.trans: 关于ACT考试的详细信息可以查询act.org.网站。

sent.orig: There has always been very strong support for euthanasia in the ACT.
sent.trans: 一直有很强烈的ACT在安乐死的支持。''。

sent.orig: The most often used units of specific activity(abbreviated Sp. Act. ) are curies/mole.
sent.trans: 最常用的比活性（符号是Sp．Act）单位是居里／克分子。

sent.orig: ACT takes just over four hours.
sent.trans: ACT考试差不多需耗时四小时。

sent.orig: ACT is designed to measure what a student learn learned in high school.
sent.trans: ACT是用于测试一名学生在高中里所学到的知识。
